hotels.title: New Zealand South Island Wellness Escape with Daily Breakfast, Dinner & Forest Hot Tub Experience
hotels.description: Nestled within a vast estate of beech forest on New Zealand's striking South Island, Nelson's most rejuvenating wellness retreat is surrounded by majestic mountains and unspoiled nature. The perfect place to disconnect from daily life, here you can listen for the gentle whispers of the Maruia River providing a soothing backdrop to your stay. These boutique villas are tucked deep in the lush native forest, with the retreat offering an array of laidback indulgences and unique experiences. Enjoy magnesium pool swims, infrared chroma-therapy sauna sessions, river hot tub soaks and forest bathing. Explore the surrounding nature on peaceful forest walks and savour the tranquillity that comes with the secluded location.
